title: Roger Stone Russian Intelligence Network: From Lobbying to Operations Timeline
description: Map Roger Stone's systematic evolution from traditional political operative to sophisticated Russian intelligence asset, documenting the progression from lobbying activities to coordinated intelligence operations targeting American democracy.
research_areas: When did Roger Stone first establish contact with Russian intelligence operatives?
How did Stone's relationships with Russian contacts evolve from business to intelligence?
What specific intelligence operations did Stone coordinate with Russian networks?
How did Stone's Russian connections influence 2016 and 2020 election activities?
What evidence exists of ongoing Russian intelligence tasking of Stone?
source_requirements: Intelligence intercepts, financial transaction records, communication metadata, court documents, congressional testimony
pdf_source: Roger Stone's Russian Influence Network_ From Lobbying to Intelligence Operations.pdf
